locations.name: Desert Oasis
locations.description: A small oasis in the middle of the desert. Luckily for you, they had water to quench your thirst!

locations.name: Betty Town
locations.description: A town whos main attraction is the Betty Brothel. Unfortunately, you caught a 'bug' during your stay.

locations.name: Keg Town
locations.description: Known throughout the land for their tall beers and fat locals. You ate your fill, drank to your hearts desire, and left with a hefty boost in moral!

locations.name: Dusty Rock
locations.description: An old and crusty rock that provided a bit of shade and a place to camp for the night.

locations.name: Switchback & Forth Canyon
locations.description: What the f@*# was that all about? You got a little lost, but no harm done.

locations.name: Vultures Nest
locations.description: Beefy birdies with ferocious appetites. One managed to take a chunk out of your abdomen while you were napping.

locations.name: Cactus County
locations.description: That place was full of pricks.

locations.name: Crooks Nook
locations.description: A shady town with crooked folk. You managed to make it out alive, but not before losing some brass to the locals.

locations.name: Camelback Mountain
locations.description: A beautiful break from the monotony of the dry lands. You sat and pondered and left feeling rejuvenated.

locations.name: Gringo Valley
locations.description: Lots of white people, lots or bourbon. Normally you would feel replenished after a whiskey-weekend, but those gringos were ponding bottom-shelf shooters until the sun rose.

locations.name: Indian Settlement
locations.description: Chief Sits-With-Turtles turned out to be easy-going. His tribe put you up for the night and sold you supplies for the trail.

locations.name: Ghost Town
locations.description: A straight of bones and banishment. Not many make it through this town alive, but you managed.
